com.acrolinx.javasdk.core.extraction.block

Class BlockDocumentImpl<PositionInDocument>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.acrolinx.javasdk.core.extraction.AbstractDocument
      • com.acrolinx.javasdk.core.extraction.block.BlockDocumentImpl<PositionInDocument>
  • Type Parameters:
    PositionInDocument - the generic type KeyType is used to specify an identifier for locating the text in original document. For text documents you may use Range.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Document, BlockDocument<PositionInDocument>, DocumentPartMapping<PositionInDocument>

    public class BlockDocumentImpl<PositionInDocument>
extends AbstractDocument
implements BlockDocument<PositionInDocument>
    A BlockDocumentImpl provides easy functions for mapping text positions to original text.

      • getText

        public String getText()
        Specified by:
        getText in interface Document
        Returns:
        the extracted text of the document.

        Note: This method will be called more than once by the Acrolinx Java SDK. It is expected that the result is always same. Maybe your implementation has to cache the result for performance reasons.

      • getOriginalOffset

        public int getOriginalOffset(int offsetInExtractedText)
        Gets the original offset. This implementation returns the offsetInExtractedText unchanged because in mark you should use getOriginalDocumentParts(Range).
        Specified by:
        getOriginalOffset in interface Document
        Parameters:
        offsetInExtractedText - will be returned
        Returns:
        offsetInExtractedText without changes
